TopicTitle: Suggest an add-on to me that has a small light part?

Articles.Content:
Looking for a small light part, to be used on a small crew transfer pod to my space station (same role as the soyuz to ISS), but the default squad light parts are huuuuge and clunky relative to the pod I'm using.

Can anyone suggest an add-on pack that has some small light parts that might not look so enormous and ugly when attached to a small ship/pod/etc ?

Looking for something more compact for a lamp part, the headlights there were the right size but attached to rover bumpers.

Someone simply MUST have added a smaller lamp light part somewhere. :-)
There is a mod called "Aviation Lights". Right Here----->http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/16925

Checking out the aviation lights link now.

Also, this "stockalike station parts" had a suitable light for anyone else looking:

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/351/Stockalike%20Station%20Parts%20Expansion
Surface Mounted Stock-Alike Lights for Self-Illumination
There is a very nice small foldable LED spotlight in the Exploration Rover System by A.S.E.T. pack

B9. They have miniscule little omni lights - you can hardly see the part when you put it in a cargo bay. And they have "large" omni lights that are smaller than a 100 battery but put out plenty of light for docking operations. They also have what looks like miniaturized stadium lighting which is great for bases.
